sentences.en: He may be conceited , illmannered, fatuous.
sentences.cn: 他也许骄傲自满, 不懂礼貌,自以为是或愚昧荒唐.

sentences.en: He seems to get pride in fatuous remarks.
sentences.cn: 说起这番蠢话来他似乎还挺得意.

sentences.en: He seems to take pride in fatuous remarks.
sentences.cn: 说起这番蠢话来,他似乎还挺得意.

sentences.en: Television commercials seem fatuous than ever.
sentences.cn: 电视节目中商业广告太多,令人厌倦.

sentences.en: Television commercials seem more fatuous than ever.
sentences.cn: 电视广告节目似乎比以往任何时候更没意思了.

sentences.en: Television commercials seem more smug and fatuous than ever.
sentences.cn: 电视的广告似乎比以前更沾沾自喜和愚蠢.

sentences.en: The assumption that such violence afflicts only the poor or deserving is both fatuous and misguided.
sentences.cn: 认为家庭暴力只会发生在穷人中的看法是愚昧和错误的.

sentences.en: The Chief was left speechless by this fatuous remark.
sentences.cn: 这句傻话让主任一时说不出话来。

sentences.en: The current reigning emperor is fatuous and self - indulgent , he just hunts in the hunting enclosure everyday.
sentences.cn: 现在的皇帝是个昏君, 每天只知道在围场打猎.

sentences.en: The fatuous Count Schwerin von Krosigk too.
sentences.cn: 那位愚蠢昏庸的施维林-冯-克罗西克伯爵也是如此.

sentences.en: This kind besotted, fatuous manner, was precisely Dickens must the bourgeoisie ruler then take warning.
sentences.cn: 这种执迷不悟 、 冥顽不化的态度, 正是狄更斯要当时的资产阶级统治者引以为戒的.

sentences.en: Why did the fatuous King send him into exile?
sentences.cn: 昏庸的楚王为什么把屈原流放了?
